name: Quickbits Hospital
description:
This game simulates the exciting field of medical facility management and the supports systems of brisk patient relocation. 

As patients enter your hospital you will need to chaperone them to the correct examination office. To improve your profit and boost margins you can expand your hospital at any time.

For specialization in rehabilitation of urgent care victims, you can major the medical equipment to certain disease categories. 

Controls:
[Arrows] - Move
[Shift] - Snap to Entrance

[Z] - Pick up / Drop Off Patient
[X] - Hold patient

[B] + [Arrows] - Expand Blueprint
[Q] - Assign Office to Blueprint
[W] - Assign Waitroom to Blueprint

[O] - Open Hospital
[C] - Close Hospital

How to play:
Build out your blueprint and start assigning offices. You can not expand an office.
Tip: Always leave an empty Blueprint to expand from.
Hold [B] and press an Arrow Key to expand the blueprint.

After having built out your blueprint, assign treatment rooms to empty blueprint squares [Q]. You will notice each office gets a number.

Open your Hospital by hitting [O]. Pick up a patient at the ENTRANCE with [Z] and drop them in the matching number office [Z].
When the patient has finished treatment in the office they will appear as lime green on the bottom of the grid. You can pick them up [Z] and drop them into the next office.
When a patient has reached your highest level office, drop them on the exit.


How to win:
Accurate to life, there is no scenario which is considered a "win." There is only amassment of wealth until eventually you do something incorrectly and muck it all up.

How to lose:
If a patient stands in the ENTRANCE for too long they will die and you will lose. Luckily, you can hold a patient [X] while picking up new ones. 

If you find yourself in the situation of having too many patients to deal with, you can create a waiting room [W] to hold them over until you've got your head on straight enough to treat them. 

[CTRL] + [R] - Restart Game
